snippet: Falling oil prices depressed energy stocks, and investors waited to see how corporate earnings would unfold.
abstract: Stock market drops sharply, as falling oil prices depress energy stocks and investors wait to see how corporate earnings will unfold.
lead_paragraph: Falling oil prices depressed energy stocks, and investors waited to see how corporate earnings would unfold.

headline.main: Market Extends New Year’s Slump, as Investors Await More Data
